content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case between two parties referred to as av and tk the case lasted for 3 years and the court reached a final resolution denoted as v the court ruled in favor of a party whose name is omitted regarding a bank account statement showing a payment of 549 euros for loan payments the court partially satisfied the claims made by both parties determining the division of their joint property and the obligations arising from a loan agreement the court also addressed the procedural costs stating that both parties are responsible for covering them the parties have the right to appeal the decision within 30 days the text provides a summary of each step taken in the case and specific code articles mentioned in the original text are §xxxxx

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
